content: In 10 days, around 42,000 chemist shops in T.N. will display the QR code¬†as per the instructions of Central Drugs Standard Control Organisation

title: India Surpasses Japan. When It May Overtake Germany As 3rd Largest Economy
content: India's GDP per capita was $2,694 in 2024, according to the latest World Bank figures, 12 times smaller than Japan's $32,487 and 20 times smaller than Germany's $56,103.

title: Cigarette, Beedi, Pan Masala To Be Costlier From Feb 1 With New Tax, Cess
content: The government on Wednesday notified February 1 as the date from which additional excise duty will be levied on tobacco products, and a new cess on pan masala.

title: Mumbai Wakes Up To Unseasonal Rainfall On New Year Day
content: While it was more intense in several areas, many other places experienced drizzle. The intensity gradually reduced after 6.15 am.

title: Madhya Pradesh Minister's "Useless" Reply To NDTV Question, Then An Apology

title: Hong Kong Welcomes 2026 Without Its Iconic Fireworks After Deadliest Fire
content: Fireworks are typically a celebratory centerpiece of Hong Kong's New Year celebrations. Not this year. The territory greeted 2026 without spectacular and colorful explosions in the sky over its iconic Victoria Harbor after a massive fire in November

title: Zelensky Says Ukraine "10% Away" From Peace Deal
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Wednesday his country was "10 percent" away from a deal to end the war with Russia, but cautioned that the most important issues were unresolved and warned against rewarding Moscow.

title: Russia Releases Video Of Drone It Claims Was Used To Attack Putin's Home
content: Russia had alleged that Ukraine carried out a drone attack on Russian President Vladimir Putin's residence in the Novgorod region, although they did not say where he was at the time.

title: New Year Celebrations Sweep Across India Amid Tight Security
content: India welcomed the New Year with grand celebrations, countdown parties and festive gatherings, as state governments across the country stepped up security measures to ensure that the celebrations passed off smoothly and without incident.

title: Fireworks, Celebrations: Countries Ring In 2026. This Was The First
content: As the world prepares to turn the calendar page, New Zealand, Australia, South Korea, North Korea and Japan have already welcomed the New Year.

title: Helped Boost Ties: PM In Letter To Tarique Rahman After Khaleda Zia's Death
content: PM Modi's letter was delivered today by foreign minister S Jaishankar, who represented India at the funeral of Khaleda Zia.

title: S Jaishankar Meets Tarique Rahman, Pak Speaker At Khaleda Zia's Funeral
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar, who represented India at the funeral of Bangladesh's former Prime Minister Khaleda Zia, met her son and Bangladesh Nationalist Party leader Tarique Rahman and handed him a letter of condolence from PM Modi.

title: At PRAGATI Meet,  PM's 'Reform, Perform And Transform' Mantra
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday stressed on the mantra of reform, perform and transform at the 50th meeting of PRAGATI, which accelerated projects worth more than Rs 85 lakh crore over the past decade.

title: 2012 Pune Serial Blasts Accused Shot Dead In Maharashtra
content: Bunty Jahagirdar, one of the accused in the 2012 Pune serial blasts case, was allegedly shot dead by unidentified assailants in Shrirampur town in Ahilyanagar district on Wednesday, police said.

title: Op Sindoor "Resounding Testament" To Resolve Against Terrorism: Government
content: Operation Sindoor stands as a "resounding testament" to India's unwavering resolve against terrorism, the defence ministry said.

title: Blog: In Manipur, The More Things Change, The More They Stay The Same
content: Thousands of people in Manipur will spend a third New Year in relief camps. A few of them have returned to villages in the foothills where the district borders meet. With hours to go before the world enters 2026, we see where things stand today.

title: 'Worrying Trend': Pinarayi Vijayan, Congress Slam Pastor's Arrest In Maharashtra
content: A pastor from Kerala and seven others were arrested on charges of offering money to people for conversion to Christianity in Maharashtra's Amravati district today.

title: Gulmarg Happy On New Year's Eve As Tourists Flock In, Snow Makes A Return
content: Thousands of tourists have flocked to Gulmarg, Kashmir's winter wonderland, to welcome the New Year with traditional music and dance.

title: Government Keeps Small Savings Rates Unchanged For 7th Straight Quarter
content: The government on Wednesday left interest rates unchanged for various small savings schemes, including PPF and NSC, for the seventh straight quarter, beginning January 1, 2026.

What will the changed regional dynamics mean in the new year?

title: Names of parties, leaders who haven‚Äôt filed asset reports to Lok Ayukta to be published in media
content: Section 22 of the Kerala Lok Ayukta Act 1999 mandates that every public servant and their family members file a statement of assets and liabilities every two years. The deadline for filing the statement for the previous two-year period had expired in June 2024

title: Wemby hyperextends knee, 'confident' he's OK
content: Spurs star Victor Wembanyama left Wednesday night's win over the Knicks with a hyperextension of his left knee but said he believes he'll be "all right" and expects to play in the next game.

content: The Packers on Wednesday claimed veteran cornerback Trevon Diggs, a day after he was waived by the Cowboys.

title: 'Impossible targets': Riders flag unsafe roads, shrinking earnings ‚Äî what triggered gig workers' protest
content: Delivery workers across India observed a New Year's Eve strike protesting low pay and lack of social security, despite app-based platforms offering festive bonuses. While many customers remained unaware, several orders faced significant delays. Platforms like Swiggy and Zepto increased per-order pay, but some workers refused the incentives, citing unachievable targets and the risk of ID blocking.

title: 'New normal': India's 2025 'zero-tolerance' doctrine pushed terror outfits & Pak to sidelines
content: India's national security adopted a harder stance in 2025 following the brutal Pahalgam massacre. Prime Minister Modi declared a 'Yuddha' against terror, leading to Operation Sindoor, a significant counteroffensive targeting terror infrastructure deep inside Pakistan and PoK. Diplomatic and military actions were taken to hold Pakistan accountable for cross-border terrorism.

title: India vs New Zealand ODI squad announcement: Date, where to watch - All you need to know
content: India and New Zealand are set for an eight-match limited-overs series, including three ODIs and five T20Is, from January 11 to 31. This series is crucial for senior players returning to the ODI setup and for finalising T20 combinations ahead of the 2026 T20 World Cup. While the BCCI has already announced the T20I squad for the New Zealand series, the ODI squad is yet to be named.

title: Happy New Year 2026: Over 70 wishes to share ‚Äî images, quotes, status & more
content: As 2026 approaches, the article highlights the diverse ways people celebrate and express New Year's wishes. It emphasizes the value of simple, heartfelt messages, relatable quotes, and genuine status updates, alongside visual elements like images and wallpapers, to connect with loved ones during this transitional period.

title: Rewind 2025: When Tesla's ex-AI director gave 'word' that changed work of software engineers
content: Andrej Karpathy coined "Vibe Coding" to describe AI-assisted programming, where developers rely on natural language prompts. This concept, recognized by Collins Dictionary as Word of the Year, sparks debate about its impact on traditional coding skills and job security in the tech industry.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens above 26,150; BSE Sensex up over 100 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in green on the first trading session of the New Year 2026. While Nifty50 went above 26,150, BSE Sensex was up over 100 points.

title: India vs New Zealand | Fit and firing: Why Agarkar & Co. can't ignore Shami anymore
content: Ajit Agarkar has been repeatedly questioned about the omission and has maintained the "need to play some cricket" stand. If 145.2 overs in Ranji Trophy, 26.5 overs in Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy and 34.2 overs in ongoing Vijay Hazare Trophy doesn't qualify, then the definition of "some cricket" needs to be made clear.

title: New Year 2026: PM Modi greets nation, prays for 'peace and happiness in society'
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and President Droupadi Murmu conveyed New Year wishes for 2026. They prayed for peace, good health, and happiness across society. The nation welcomed the year with vibrant celebrations. Fireworks lit up cities as people gathered to mark the fresh beginnings of 2026 with enthusiasm and cheer.

title: Neuralink and parenting: Meta AI chief Alexandr Wang on kids; will wait until Neuralink advances
content: Meta's AI head, Alexandr Wang, revealed he will delay having children until advanced brain-computer interface (BCI) technology like Neuralink is widely available. Wang believes children's early neuroplasticity offers a prime window for intuitive BCI integration, potentially enabling future generations to learn and utilize superintelligence tools more effectively than adults.

title: Stock market outlook 2026: Where are Sensex & Nifty headed? Top things to know
content: Indian equities lagged global markets in 2025 due to muted corporate earnings, FII selling, and missed AI rally. Despite touching record highs, broader market sentiment remained subdued. Experts anticipate a stronger 2026, driven by domestic growth, potential FII return, and improved valuations, with Nifty and Sensex targets set higher.

title: 'I'm in Dubai,' says Hadi killing suspect Dhaka accused India of sheltering
content: A key suspect in the murder of Bangladeshi Islamist radical Sharif Osman Hadi has denied involvement and refuted claims he fled to India. Faisal Karim Masud, identified as a primary suspect by Bangladesh, stated in a video message from Dubai that he is not involved in the killing and was forced to leave Bangladesh due to false implications.

title: New Year, same air: Delhi starts 2026 with ‚Äòvery poor‚Äô AQI at 372; Anand Vihar worst hit
content: Delhi woke to dense fog and 'very poor' air quality with AQI at 372, impacting visibility and traffic. Unfavorable meteorological conditions are expected to keep pollution levels high for the next six days. Despite a slight annual PM2.5 decline, the polluted season saw a rise, with Delhi remaining the most polluted city in the NCR.

title: Aadhaar‚ÄìPAN linking deadline ends today: How to link, penalty and other details
content: Linking your PAN card with Aadhaar is crucial to avoid penalties. The Income Tax department's portal guides you through a simple online process involving your PAN and Aadhaar numbers, followed by an OTP verification. Failure to link by December 31, 2025, will render your PAN inoperative, impacting tax refunds and leading to higher tax deductions and collections.

title: SC handled 75k cases in 2025; unmatched by any top court
content: Chief Justice Surya Kant has introduced a new system to prioritize cases for the disadvantaged. Petitions from disabled individuals, acid attack survivors, senior citizens over 80, those below the poverty line, and legal aid recipients will now be fast-tracked. This initiative aims to ensure their cases don't get overlooked amidst the Supreme Court's massive caseload.

title: 'Want 22 of 28 seats from Kolkata, nearby areas': Amit Shah sets target for Bengal BJP
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah urged BJP workers in Bengal to aim for victory in the 2026 assembly elections, setting a target of winning 22 out of 28 seats in and around Kolkata. He also expressed concerns about infiltration and a "changing demography" in the region, while dismissing perceptions of organizational weakness.

title: Bollywood actress issues clarification; breaks silence on ‚Äòrelationship‚Äô with Surya
content: Actress Khushi Mukherjee clarified her recent remarks about T20I captain Suryakumar Yadav, stating they were friends and no romantic relationship exists. She explained her comments were taken out of context and her Instagram was hacked. Mukherjee expressed support for Yadav and Team India ahead of the T20 World Cup, emphasizing no current contact.

title: Zack & Dominique Wheeler‚Äôs 2025 net worth: Earnings, family & more
content: Zack Wheeler's net worth in 2025 is around 70 million dollars. This wealth stems mainly from his Major League Baseball contracts.  His wife, Dominique Wheeler, keeps her finances private.  Their combined net worth highlights how elite MLB deals shape family incomes in the modern era.  Wheeler's recent contract extension with the Phillies significantly boosted his financial standing.

title: Max Scherzer & Erica May-Scherzer‚Äôs 2025 net worth: Inside $180m empire
content: Max Scherzer, the formidable MLB pitcher, has amassed a $180 million net worth by 2025, a testament to his on-field dominance and shrewd financial planning. His career earnings are bolstered by strategic contracts and selective endorsements. Wife Erica May-Scherzer, a former player, significantly contributes to their philanthropic endeavors and family's financial stability.

title: Joseph Parker & Andy Lee 2025 net worth: Earnings, investments & lifestyle
content: Joseph Parker and Andy Lee continue to attract fans and generate significant income beyond their boxing careers. Parker, a former WBO heavyweight champion, earns millions from fights and endorsements, while retired WBO middleweight champion Lee maintains his fortune through coaching and commentary. Their combined net worth is projected to be between $25-$37 million in 2025.

title: Top stocks to buy today: Stock recommendations for January 1
content: Top stock market recommendations: Aakash K Hindocha of Nuvama Professional Clients Group recommends buying BHEL, IOC, and Gujarat Mineral Development Corporation. He also shares his views on Nifty and Bank Nifty.

title: Fresh relief: Cabinet freezes Vodafone Idea dues at Rs 87.7k crore
content: The Union cabinet has frozen Vodafone Idea's AGR dues at Rs 87,695 crore, with payments rescheduled over 10 years starting 2031-32. This decision, aimed at public interest and consumer welfare, offers the beleaguered telecom company a significant financial reprieve. Despite the relief, the company's shares saw a decline.

title: Contaminated Indore tap water leaves seven dead, 162 hospitalised
content: Contaminated tap water in Indore, India's cleanest city, has led to multiple deaths and dozens hospitalized due to diarrhoea and vomiting. A leakage mixing sewage with drinking water in Bhagirathpura is the suspected cause. Officials are investigating, with financial aid and free medical treatment announced for affected families.

title: 'Light of my life': Virat Kohli's new year post with Anushka Sharma breaks the internet
content: Virat Kohli celebrated the start of 2026 with a personal social media post alongside wife Anushka Sharma. On the cricketing front, the 35-year-old continues his remarkable ODI form, recently becoming the fastest to 16,000 List A runs after a stellar domestic return and a strong ODI series against South Africa.

title: 'We will come back when...': Trump pulls National Guard troops from Chicago, LA and Portland
content: President Trump has withdrawn National Guard troops from Chicago, Los Angeles, and Portland, citing legal hurdles in his deployment efforts. He indicated a potential return of forces if crime escalates. The troops faced significant legal challenges, including Supreme Court refusal and federal court injunctions, ultimately leading to their removal from these Democrat-led cities.

title: 'Industrialist' scripts Rs 6,200 crore swindle with 60 shell firms
content: A Kolkata businessman orchestrated a massive Rs 6,200 crore bank fraud using 60 shell companies, with bank chiefs allegedly complicit.  Fictitious iron and steel transactions, involving fake sales and purchases, were conducted through book entries.  The scam was exposed after the arrest of a former bank CMD, leading to the attachment of properties worth over Rs 106 crore.

title: Third time's the charm? Oyo files for 6.7k crore IPO
content: Oyo's parent company, Prism, has confidentially filed draft IPO papers with SEBI, aiming to raise up to Rs 6,650 crore and targeting a valuation of $7-$8 billion. This marks the company's third attempt at going public, with plans for a fresh issue of shares and no immediate offer for sale.

title: Assam: Couple killed as mob torches home over witchcraft suspicion; probe launched
content: In a harrowing event in Karbi Anglong district, Assam, a couple lost their lives when a mob turned violent, setting their home ablaze. Driven by unfounded fears of witchcraft, local villagers reportedly assaulted the couple before igniting their house.

title: 'Spirit' first look: Prabhas, Triptii Dimri as Sandeep Reddy Vanga recreates 'Animal' buzz
content: The new year kicked off on a high note for Prabhas fans as the makers of Spirit unveiled the film‚Äôs first look exactly at midnight. The Pan-India project marks the first-ever collaboration between Prabhas and director Sandeep Reddy Vanga, instantly making the reveal one of the most discussed cinematic moments as 2026 began.

title: Ex-Bengal BJP chief Dilip Ghosh back in party spotlight
content: Dilip Ghosh's return to party meetings during Amit Shah's Kolkata visit signals a potential larger role for the former Bengal BJP chief. However, the absence of key Matua and Rajbangshi leaders from a recent BJP meeting highlights underlying unease within the party ahead of the 2026 polls.

title: Delhi doctor arrested for Maharashtra kidney racket; Trichy medic on the run
content: A pan-India kidney trafficking syndicate with alleged international links has been exposed in Maharashtra.  The illicit market saw transplants priced up to Rs 80 lakh, while impoverished donors reportedly received as little as Rs 5 lakh. Police have named two specialists as key players in the network, which allegedly conducted surgeries in Trichy.

title: Happy New Year 2026: Wishes, messages, quotes, images, Facebook & Whatsapp status
content: As 2026 approaches, the article offers a collection of genuine New Year wishes, messages, and quotes to help express heartfelt sentiments. It provides options for various relationships, from simple and real to warm, thoughtful, and professional, encouraging authentic communication over perfect pronouncements.

title: Search op in Rajouri after VDG opens fire at terror suspect; high alert in Chenab region
content: A village defence guard fired shots after reportedly spotting a terror suspect in Rajouri's Kalakote area. Security forces have intensified surveillance and anti-terror operations in the Chenab region and frontier districts. Meanwhile, village defence guards are receiving enhanced training to bolster grassroots security, and a suspected Pakistani drone was briefly sighted near the International Border in Samba.

title: J&K court acquits 3 accused held for possessing AK-47, grenades
content: A Jammu and Kashmir court acquitted three individuals arrested in 2022 for alleged arms possession, citing a lack of independent witnesses and corroborative evidence. The prosecution failed to prove conscious and unauthorized possession of the recovered arms and ammunition, leading to the acquittal of all three accused.

title: J&K: HC frees Uri woman convicted in 1979 murder; cites 46-year delay
content: The Jammu and Kashmir High Court has set aside the conviction of an elderly woman in a 1979 murder case, citing 46 years of prolonged proceedings and her age. The court ruled her sentence be treated as already undergone, closing the case due to the "heat of passion" and decades of litigation.

title: Goa nightclub fire: Illegal salt pan structure, collusion with officials; what probe report revealed
content: A magisterial inquiry found a Goa nightclub, where 25 died in a fire, was illegally built on a salt pan and operated without valid permissions. Systemic failures and alleged collusion by local authorities were highlighted, as the village panchayat issued a license despite it not being renewed, allowing the club to continue functioning.

title: Spreading 'falsehood' against Modi govt: Nadda hits out at Kharge
content: BJP chief J.P. Nadda accused Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge of spreading falsehoods against the Modi government. Nadda refuted Kharge's allegations on MGNREGA, economy, and environmental issues, stating the people have rejected Congress's lies in multiple elections. He urged Kharge to introspect instead of spreading misinformation.

title: From memes to movements: How 2025 became the year of political awakening for Gen Z
content: What began as side-eyeing governments for being ‚Äúpompous in power‚Äù escalated into calling them out, loudly and publicly. From campus corridors to capital streets, the Gen Z, largely mistaken as the ‚Äúnonchalants,‚Äù made it clear they were no longer willing to cope, stay low-key, or wait their turn. Across countries, young people discovered that turning up in person still mattered. That streets were not obsolete.

title: Cong slams arrest of Nagpur Christian priest; demands action against Bajrang Dal
content: Congress has slammed the BJP following the arrest of a Christian priest and 11 others in Nagpur during a prayer meeting, accusing the party of religious bigotry.  MP KC Venugopal and Kerala LoP VD Satheesan condemned the arrests, demanding the FIR be withdrawn and calling for action against Bajrang Dal activists. They highlighted concerns over minority rights and constitutional freedoms.

title: CeeDee Lamb‚Äôs luxury car collection spotlight after Week 17 loss
content: Dallas Cowboys star CeeDee Lamb has a taste for luxury cars and owns quite a few stunners, including a customised Lamborghini Urus

title: Head hopes to revive Ashes drinks tradition with Eng; why it broke down in 2023
content: Australian opener Travis Head expressed his hope for a return to the tradition of post-Ashes drinks between England and Australia.  He believes mutual respect exists despite past tensions, particularly after the Jonny Bairstow stumping incident in the 2023 series. Head looks forward to sharing a beer, highlighting the positive relationships between players on both sides.

title: Lamar Jackson injury update: Will Ravens QB play Week 18 vs Steelers?
content: Lamar Jackson's availability for the crucial Week 18 clash against the Steelers is uncertain due to a painful back injury. While optimism is growing with potential midweek practice, the Ravens are prioritizing his long-term health. His return would significantly boost Baltimore's offense and complicate Pittsburgh's defensive strategy.

title: NFL futures: Seattle Seahawks enter Week 18 as Super Bowl favorites
content: Through 17 weeks of the NFL season, the  Seattle Seahawks  are the new favorites to win the Super Bowl 60, following the  Los Angeles Rams 's loss on "Monday Night Football." The Rams drop to second, as three NFC West teams sit in the top four. The AFC West-winning  Denver Broncos  have the third-best odds to win the Super Bowl at +700. The  San Francisco 49ers  at +850 and the AFC East champion  New England Patriots  at +900. The Seahawks and 49ers meet in Week 18. Note: Odds by  DraftKings Sportsbook  and subject to change.

title: Govt bans high-dose nimesulide painkiller pills citing health risk
content: Anuja Jaiswal is a Senior Assistant Editor at The Times of India, with an impressive 18-year career in narrative journalism. She specializes in health and heritage reporting, expertly simplifying complex health information to make it engaging and understandable for readers. Her deep dives into heritage topics are well-researched, resulting in captivating narratives that resonate with her audience. Over the years, she has worked in Chandigarh, Chhattisgarh and West UP, gaining diverse on-ground experience that shapes her storytelling. Read More

title: ACC preview: Final Four contenders, more March Madness predictions
content: the 18-team league received its lowest number of NCAA bids in more than a decade . it hasn't been a top-three conference since before 2020 . the ACC had eight top-40 teams in 2019 compared to last season's four .

title: How speedster Zachariah Branch made a fast impression at Georgia
content: Zachariah Branch puts Georgia up 3 scores with a 13-yard receiving touchdown . the former USC receiver and his brother, Zion, entered the transfer portal in 2024 . "he made me aware of him," coach Kirby Smart said .

title: Duty breach: AI pilot detained at Vancouver airport after failing breath test
content: a staffer at Vancouver duty free either saw him inadvertently sipping wine or found him smelling of liquor while he was buying a bottle . air India managed to quickly find a replacement . the ultra long haul, to be operated by four pilots or two sets, did so with just a two-hour delay .

title: No more Exit 30: Davidson renames historic exit after Stephen Curry
content: Stephen Curry is renamed Stephen Curry Interchange for his contributions to the school's men's basketball program . the star has worn the number 30 throughout his college and the pro career . he wore his Davidson sweatsuit along with a pair of "Carmine" Air Jordan Retro 6's .

title: 'Need this on my fridge': Bucs TEs' festive Christmas cards lost in mail
content: two Tampa Bay Buccaneers teammates posted a series of hilariously awkward holiday photos on Instagram . the two were seen wearing matching head-to-toe outfits and striking an assortment of cheesy poses in front of a Christmas tree . no players were injured attempting the stunt .

title: Our 2025 All-Rookie Team: We picked standout first-years at every single position
content: all rookies make bad plays, and peak performances are weighed fairly heavily . this list is based on the bulk of positive plays . it's the right time to summarize some seasonlong performances . we turn our eyes to the race to super Bowl LX .
